idea_or_offer: Sa Dec Flower Hunt: A gamified tourism & commerce platform connecting visitors with traditional flower growers in Sa Dec, Vietnam.
target_persona_hint: Gen Z & Millennials who love eco-tourism, culture, and authentic experiences. Also local flower buyers.

context.background: Sa Dec is a historic flower village. The project aims to digitize the experience, helping farmers sell more and tourists have fun finding 'rare' flowers.
context.founder_vision: Reviving the old village with new tech (AI, Gamification).
